div.span: We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive. Avalon Glendale is a luxurious rental community bringing unprecedented comfort to the Glendale-Burbank-Pasadena area. Set at the foot of the stunning Verdugo mountains, these beautiful Glendale apartments are available in bright and airy one-, two- and three-bedroom floor plans with central air conditioning, private patios, fully equipped gourmet kitchens and European style cabinets. And now with our Furnished+ program, apartment living is easier than ever before. Appreciate the stylish furnishings and enjoy the convenience of pre-installed Wi-Fi and cable TV, flexible lease-terms, and utilities that are included in your rent. With Furnished+, you can step right into the life you want to live, without all the hassle. Picture living life effortlessly in the lush fountain courtyard, soak in the beauty of the sparkling heated swimming pool and feel rejuvenated after your time at the state of the art fitness center. With an amazing array of facilities and great services, it is easy to see why people love Avalon Glendale. GLENDALE APARTMENTS BY AVALON If you’re looking for a blissful lifestyle in a Glendale apartment rental, you’ve come to the right place. This beautiful new community of luxury apartments offers countless amenities in a gorgeous setting. Members can choose from several different floor plans and get privy to a host of amenities, while taking advantage of the sunny Southern California weather. Centrally located, these Glendale apartments boast a variety of attractions as they are just minutes from the beaches, downtown Los Angeles, Hollywood, the Rose Bowl, Dodger Stadium, Staples Center, NBC Universal and the Getty Center. Avalon Glendale also has a prime neighborhood location with a wide range of exciting shopping and dining venues nearby. There are countless memorable attractions and events to keep residents busy in their free time at these apartments in Glendale. GLENDALE APARTMENT COMMUNITY As a member of the Glendale apartment rental community, you will be privy to what we refer to as the Avalon Advantage. You will enjoy special benefits such as a 30-day move-in guarantee, a national relocation program, a maintenance response guarantee and much more. The Glendale apartments form the perfect little neighborhood that offers the right blend of luxury and comfort to meet the specific needs of each of our discerning customers. So why are you still thinking about it? Click the Contact Us button to schedule an appointment and discover the best Glendale apartments in Los Angeles County, California today.

div.h2: The service. The standards. The life.

a.div: Great service is one of the things we think about most. We start with selecting passionate people. Then we let them put that passion to work. Our people are a vital part of what shapes the character of each Avalon community.

We strive to align our standards with yours, delivering an experience that lives up to them. We know you've put a lot into getting to where you are in life. We believe where you live should reflect that. So we put ourselves into making sure it does.

Effortless. Enjoyable. Truly comfortable living is both. That's why we go out of our way to choose locations and to design amenities that put so much within reach. So you can live easy without even trying.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

div.p: Curious about the community layout? You can download the community site map here.

div.h2: Only the best for your best life

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Homes fully furnished and connected to give you the lifestyle you deserve. Flexible lease terms for the ultimate convenience.

a.div: See what we do to take pet friendly living to the next level.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: From fitness amenities to resident perks, we offer a variety of spaces and places to help you meet your wellness goals.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Start earning points on rent with our free residents reward program. Use your points for travel, future rent credit, fitness classes, and more.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Pay rent, submit a service request, find policies and more with our convenient online resident portal.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Offering a wealth of resident resources, our Relocation Advantage program assists in making your transition a smooth one.

Live Up."},"displayProperties":{},"localEdits":{},"variants":{}}}]},{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/CommunityDescription","props":{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/CommunityDescription","id":"f0ftsYCQ5Fp7chh","contentConfig":{"contentService":"","contentConfigValues":{},"inherit":true},"customFields":{"title":"Make Yourself at Home","description":"We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive. Avalon Glendale is a luxurious rental community bringing unprecedented comfort to the Glendale-Burbank-Pasadena area. Set at the foot of the stunning Verdugo mountains, these beautiful Glendale apartments are available in bright and airy one-, two- and three-bedroom floor plans with central air conditioning, private patios, fully equipped gourmet kitchens and European style cabinets. And now with our Furnished+ program, apartment living is easier than ever before. Appreciate the stylish furnishings and enjoy the convenience of pre-installed Wi-Fi and cable TV, flexible lease-terms, and utilities that are included in your rent. With Furnished+, you can step right into the life you want to live, without all the hassle. Picture living life effortlessly in the lush fountain courtyard, soak in the beauty of the sparkling heated swimming pool and feel rejuvenated after your time at the state of the art fitness center. With an amazing array of facilities and great services, it is easy to see why people love Avalon Glendale. GLENDALE APARTMENTS BY AVALON If you’re looking for a blissful lifestyle in a Glendale apartment rental, you’ve come to the right place. This beautiful new community of luxury apartments offers countless amenities in a gorgeous setting. Members can choose from several different floor plans and get privy to a host of amenities, while taking advantage of the sunny Southern California weather. Centrally located, these Glendale apartments boast a variety of attractions as they are just minutes from the beaches, downtown Los Angeles, Hollywood, the Rose Bowl, Dodger Stadium, Staples Center, NBC Universal and the Getty Center. Avalon Glendale also has a prime neighborhood location with a wide range of exciting shopping and dining venues nearby. There are countless memorable attractions and events to keep residents busy in their free time at these apartments in Glendale. GLENDALE APARTMENT COMMUNITY As a member of the Glendale apartment rental community, you will be privy to what we refer to as the Avalon Advantage. You will enjoy special benefits such as a 30-day move-in guarantee, a national relocation program, a maintenance response guarantee and much more. The Glendale apartments form the perfect little neighborhood that offers the right blend of luxury and comfort to meet the specific needs of each of our discerning customers. So why are you still thinking about it? Click the Contact Us button to schedule an appointment and discover the best Glendale apartments in Los Angeles County, California today."},"displayProperties":{},"localEdits":{},"variants":{}}},{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/PricingOverview","props":{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/PricingOverview","id":"f0fQ29zT5Fp7cjB","contentConfig":{"contentService":"","contentConfigValues":{},"inherit":true},"customFields":{"imgSrc":"https://cloudfront-us-east-1.images.arcpublishing.com/avalonbay/GXSAHEHZHFHK7KWYDH6Y5QPGIM.jpg","imgAlt":null,"furnishedDescription":"Furnished+ offers all the essential items you need to move in plus conveniences like flexible lease terms, included utilities, and immediate access to highspeed Wi-Fi and cable TV."},"displayProperties":{},"localEdits":{},"variants":{}}},{"collection":"chains","type":"CORE_CommunityBrandCards","props":{"collection":"chains","type":"CORE_CommunityBrandCards","id":"c0fQc7L36Fp7c9x","customFields":{"title":"The service.\nThe standards.\nThe life."},"displayProperties":{}},"children":[{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/CommunityBrandCard","props":{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/CommunityBrandCard","id":"f0fj38YV5Fp7cav","contentConfig":{"contentService":"","contentConfigValues":{},"inherit":true},"customFields":{"title":"The Service","link":"/","description":"Great service is one of the things we think about most.
